p: Results: (i) FARIUS:n = 22;mean = 10,25;SD = 1,013;min = 7,5;max = 12,3;Expert:n = 10;mean = 10,15; SD = 0,463;min = 9,7;max = 11,3. Statistical analysis did NOT reveal a significant difference between groups (p = 0,823; p > 0,05). (ii) Evaluation of US images reveal 81,2 %(12,2 of 15) correct answers (mean:12,2; min = 8; max = 15; SDE = 1,84), sensitivity (98,2 %), specificity (73,2 %).
